About

Hi, I'm Mitchell Hanberg

I live and work in Indianapolis, graduating from Purdue in 2016. I enjoy exploring the outdoors, photography, and the occasional side project.

Here you can follow my professional development: books I'm reading, projects on which I'm working, and personal/professional reflections.

Questions? Did I say something wrong? Shoot me an email at mitchellhanberg@gmail.com
